definition.alue: The version independent globally unique identifier (guid) for the artifact.

definition.value: The version specific globally unique identifier (guid) for the artifact.
The short name identifier for the artifact (e.g. CMS104v8).
The version-independent endorser identifier for the artifact (e.g. 0002).
The version-independent publisher identifier for the artifact (e.g. 104).
